title: Meon v1.1.2
description:
Meon invade Android devices!
Meon is a cute and addictive puzzle game.

In 1997, Professor Tagishaki, from Tokyo Quantum Mechanics Institute, found new elementary particles that he called Meons. In this puzzle game, you must solve more than 120 levels to free Meons. 

Use Laser, Prism, Splitter and other various tools to light all the Meons and solve the Light Quest!

Features:

- Cute Meons 
- Magical musics
- Additive puzzles 
- More than 120 levels to solve
- HD graphics
- Move to SD
- Share with friends

MEON MAKES LIFE SMART

What's New: (Updated: October 2, 2013)

Ver. 1.1.2
- Improved display Goto screen for tablets

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.manbolo.meon" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
